description.value:
When you learn this ability, you learn the Mantra Sheer Chaos associated with your Chaos Number:

  • Sheer Chaos: Roll on the 1d100 Sheer Chaos Table, this effect activates at the beginning of your next turn.  You can feel this effect building, know what it will be, and can warn your allies.  

 

While any of your Sheer Chaos effects are active or set to activate on your next turn, you cannot roll again on the Sheer Chaos Table.  

 

Sheer Chaos Table

#

Effect

#

Effect

1

Lose all @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

44

You are able to speak with animals and understand their speech for 1 minute.

2

You are silenced until you end your turn.  

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

45

You have the Force of Will spell active for 1 minute without concentration.

3

On heads, you are sickened until you end your turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

46

You are teleported to a location you can see within 100 feet.  

4-8

Roll a 1d6 on the table below and pick one of the options from that.  All creatures within 50 feet gain vulnerability to the chosen damage type for 1 minute.  

  1. Pick: Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing
  2. Pick: Acid or Poison
  3. Pick: Chaos or Psychic
  4. Pick: Cold or Fire
  5. Pick: Lightning or Force
  6. Pick: Necrotic or Radiant

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

47-49

You summon a creature of a CR of half your overall level or lower decided by the GM.  It has its own free will, and gains an Intelligence of at least 10 and the ability to speak your language if it lacked these before.  While confused by its new locale, the creature initially regards you as an ally and will generally listen to your commands so long as you prove yourself an ally to it.  It remains summoned until its hit points reach zero or a separate creature is summoned by Sheer Chaos.  This creature’s summoning does not prevent you from rolling again on the Sheer Chaos table.

9-10

You are transformed into a Toad as if transformed by the Verminize spell until the end of your next turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

50

You gain true sight for 1 minute.

11

You are stunned until the start of your next turn.

Gain two @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice.

51-52

Restore all @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice.

12-13

Flip a coin.  

On heads, you grow 1 size and your physical attacks are one die size larger.  

On tails, you shrink 1 size, your physical attacks are one die size smaller, and you gain 1 @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.  

Either way, it lasts until the end of your next turn.

53-56

Pick an object or creature within 60 feet.  You suddenly know one detail, secret, or part of its history, as decided by the GM.  These facts are presented as if rolling highly on an Intelligence (Culture) check or divining some long-hidden past about the object.

14

You and all adjacent creatures start bleeding.  

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

57

You gain the effects of the Quicken spell.

15

For the next minute, when you target a creature with a spell, heal all adjacent creatures by 1d6 hp.  

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

58

Gain an additional action on your next turn.

16-17

You become spiritually linked with the first creature you see for 1 minute.  You are both charmed by each other, and when either of you take damage, the other takes the same amount of damage.  

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

59

Gain an additional minor action on your next turn.

18-20

You explode in Chaotic energy, taking 1d4 Chaos damage per Cleric level you have taken, and dealing 1d6 damage per Cleric level to all creatures within 10 feet.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die for each injured ally.

60-61

You briefly grow surreal ever-changing limbs out of your back that are difficult to describe, and gain a Fly and Swim speed of 100ft until the end of your next turn.

21-22

An Incept is summoned adjacent to your position.  It is hostile to you.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

62

Gain an additional reaction on your next turn.

23-24

Cast Lash Out.  Treat yourself as a target for the spell as well.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

63-64

You appear identical to another creature of your choice that you have met.  This is an illusion that instantly is recognizable as an illusion when someone or something attempts to touch the illusive parts.

25

You are blinded until the end of your turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

65-67

A surreal swirling of energy encapsulates you.  You are resistant to all damage types until the start of your next turn.

26

You are deafened until the start of your next turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

68

Pick a creature within 60 feet, they must roll a DC 13 Presence (Save) check or else become stunned until the end of their next turn.

27-28

The nearest creature to you must make a DC 10 Presence (Save) check.  

On success, nothing happens.

On failure, you and the nearest creature swap bodies for 1 minute.  During this time, your mental attributes remain the same, and whichever of you is a Chaos Cleric gains 1 @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

69-71

A duplicate of yourself appears next to you for 1 minute.  You and your duplicate are the same person in two bodies, and share all mental faculties, stats, and a turn.  Each self can take their own action each turn, but all other actions are shared, movement is split between each self, and your health and mana pool is shared and unchanged.

29-30

If you die within the next 1 minute, your body will be reborn as if affected by the Reincarnate spell 1d4 days later, regardless of whether or not you are alive at that time.  When this happens, restore all your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice.  

72-74

You can feel your body jitter and jerk, crackling with energy, as if your mana has a mind of its own.  All damage you deal becomes Chaos damage until the end of your next turn.

31

Strange music radiates from you for 1 minute, being audible up to 100 feet away.  If your GM is playing music, they must change the song to another song for all to hear.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

75-77

The ground around you shifts and twists strangely in a radius of 30 feet, becoming difficult terrain.  All other creatures in this radius must make a DC 15 Strength (Save) or Dexterity (Save) check or be Restrained.  

32-33

All creatures within 60 feet see strange scintillating shapes that cover parts of their vision, giving disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and a -5 to Awareness for 1 minute.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

78-80

You have +5 AC until the end of your next turn.

34-35

Flip a coin.

On heads, you are frightened of the largest creature within 60ft until the start of your next turn.

On tails, you are frightened of the smallest creature within 60ft until the start of your next turn.

Either way, gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

81-85

Pick a non-living object nearby that is not being worn or held.  It becomes entrapped in chaos, jerking and twisting wildly, and dealing 1d20 chaos damage when touched for the next 1 minute.  At the end of this duration, it appears as if nothing had happened to it.  

36

You are deafened until the start of your next turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

86-87

Pick a creature within 60 feet, they must roll a DC 15 Presence (Save) check or else become transformed into a Toad as if by the Verminize spell until the end of their next turn.

37

You have -2 AC until the end of your next turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

88

You gain the effects of the Haste spell.

38

You are petrified until the start of your next turn.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

89-90

The effects of the Cloak spell are applied to 3 creatures of your choice within 30 feet.

39

You are overwhelmed by vertigo and fall prone.

Gain a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.

91-94

Spells cost half mana until the end of your next turn.

40

You or an adjacent creature of your choice regains 5 hit points at the start of their turn for the next 1 minute.

95

All creatures within 30 feet must make a DC 15 Presence (Save) check or else become charmed by you.

41

All your melee attacks and touch spells inexplicably have a 60ft range for 1 minute.

96-98

Your form changes as if the spell Mutate was cast on yourself.

42

Become ill-defined and strange in shape, as you take on the essence of another being.  For the next 1 minute, when asked to roll a skill check, you can choose any of your skills to make that skill check in.  However, you cannot use the same skill twice within the duration.  

99

The first Critical Failure you roll, if rolled in the next 1 minute, counts as a Critical Success instead.  

43

The area is filled with extremely thick smoke in a radius of 30ft around you.  For the duration, anyone within is blinded and cannot be seen, and anyone without cannot see creatures within.

100

A golden apple appears in your hand.  Taking a bite from it causes the rest of the apple to disappear, and the creature to roll on this table.  Its taste constantly changes in the mouth.
